ViewObject.Name: LovColorCodeVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 'BLUE' AS VALUE , '107,154,202' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'RED' AS VALUE , '214,88,69' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'GREEN' AS VALUE , '80,146,90' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'ORANGE' AS VALUE , '254,153,0' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'GOLD' AS VALUE , '207,166,7' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'SEAWEED' AS VALUE , '195,191,84' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'LIME' AS VALUE , '132,198,50' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TEAL' AS VALUE , '81,173,171' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MIDNIGHTBLUE' AS VALUE , '61,152,201' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'LAVENDAR' AS VALUE , '140,140,207' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'INDIGO' AS VALUE , '152,109,208' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'PLUM' AS VALUE , '185,93,138' AS CODE FROM DUAL
